word_mean: 用于测量空间点位相对地面高度的仪器。

sentence.Network_en: Fixed cistern barometers are used as a standard for checking altimeter.
sentence.Network_cn: 固定槽式气压计可以作为标准件去检验测高计.

sentence.Network_en: A barometric altimeter indicates height above sea level or some other selected elevation.
sentence.Network_cn: 气压高度表用以指示海平面或另外某个被选定高度以上的高度.

sentence.Network_en: Basic Barometric Altimeter simulink model a full source code, has been tested.
sentence.Network_cn: 基本气压高度表仿真模型完整的源代码, 已经过测试.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语常见词根前缀后缀大全 ... thermemeter 温度计 altimeter 高度计 pronounce 发音.
...demn(指责)(记) ex+alt(高)→高出→ 赞扬(同) 同根词：altitude(高度); altimeter(高度表)(例) His speech exalted the candidate's virtues.
...音"(和contralto同义)，这是因为女低音的音域和男声最高音很相像的缘故。英语中另有-些词，如altimeter(测高仪)altitude(高度)，altar(祭坛)等也源自拉丁语altus。
...气被排出，盒盖由一弹簧支持，大气压力的变化使盒盖逆弹簧力移动，该移动量由一套灵敏的杠杆系统所放大，使指针绕标尺移动。真空气压计不及水银气压计准确，但更为坚固和方便适用。因此用它作测高计(altimeter)。barycentre 质心

entry.def: An altimeter is an instrument in an aircraft that shows the height of the aircraft above the ground.

means.word_mean: 1. an instrument that measures the height above ground; used in navigation

auth_sentence.content: Prof Laxon solved the problem of separating ice from water in the satellite altimeter signal.
auth_sentence.res_content: Prof Laxon solved the problem of separating ice from water in the satellite altimeter signal.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Prof Laxon solved the problem of separating ice from water in the satellite altimeter signal.

auth_sentence.content: The US space agency satellite uses a laser altimeter to measure the elevation of the ice sheets.
auth_sentence.res_content: The US space agency satellite uses a laser altimeter to measure the elevation of the ice sheets.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The US space agency satellite uses a laser altimeter to measure the elevation of the ice sheets.

auth_sentence.content: Then using precision depth sensors and an altimeter we can infer directly the local melt rates of the ice sheet above us.
auth_sentence.res_content: Then using precision depth sensors and an altimeter we can infer directly the local melt rates of the ice sheet above us.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Then using precision depth sensors and an altimeter we can infer directly the local melt rates of the ice sheet above us.
